2192.subject: BUS
2192.descrlong: Assesses strategic implications of adopting new technologies and enabling transformational change at the enterprise level in our knowledge-based economy.  Covers creating business value through IT, assessing and managing risk, measuring financial value and risk of IT adoption, managing disruptive technologies, managing technology innovation, positioning the CIO in enterprise leadership and strategy management, marketing innovative products in a global economy, and assessing enterprise implications of technology trends. (Offered Spring semester.)
